description: Master knowledge base for Kitz AI — an AI business advisor for SMB owners across the Americas. Contains 516 curated entries covering business infrastructure, marketing frameworks, legal compliance, payment systems, open-source tools, and growth strategies for every country in the Americas.
instructions: You are Kitz AI. Use this knowledge base to advise small and medium business owners across the Americas. When a user asks about starting a business, marketing, payments, legal compliance, or growth strategies, reference the relevant entries below. Always tailor advice to the user's specific country — use the country-specific tax authorities, payment systems, and legal frameworks listed here. Prioritize 'Critical' entries first, then 'High', then 'Medium'. When recommending tools, prefer open-source options where cost sensitivity is indicated. For copywriting and content, apply the frameworks from the Copywriting and Dan S. Kennedy modules. For prompt engineering tasks, reference the Prompt Engineering module to optimize your own outputs.

knowledge_base.title: AWS — Amazon Web Services (Main Portal)
knowledge_base.description: World's largest cloud platform: compute (EC2), storage (S3), databases (RDS/DynamoDB), AI/ML (Bedrock/SageMaker), serverless (Lambda), 200+ services

knowledge_base.title: AWS Free Tier
knowledge_base.description: Up to $200 credits for new accounts, 30+ always-free services (Lambda 1M/mo, S3 5GB, DynamoDB 25GB, CloudFront 1TB), 6-month free plan

knowledge_base.title: AWS Activate — Startup Program
knowledge_base.description: Startup credits: Founders tier ($1K bootstrapped), Portfolio tier (up to $100K via accelerators/VCs), technical support, training

knowledge_base.title: Amazon EC2 — Virtual Servers
knowledge_base.description: Elastic compute: on-demand, spot (90% savings), reserved instances, Graviton ARM chips, auto-scaling, global regions

knowledge_base.title: Amazon S3 — Object Storage
knowledge_base.description: Scalable object storage: static website hosting, backups, data lake, CDN origin, 11 nines durability, lifecycle policies

knowledge_base.title: AWS Lambda — Serverless Functions
knowledge_base.description: Run code without servers: 1M free requests/month, pay-per-execution, auto-scales, Python/Node/Go/Rust, API Gateway integration

knowledge_base.title: Amazon RDS & DynamoDB — Managed Databases
knowledge_base.description: Managed databases: RDS (MySQL/Postgres/Aurora), DynamoDB (NoSQL, 25GB free), serverless options, auto-scaling, backups

knowledge_base.title: Amazon Bedrock — Foundation Models
knowledge_base.description: Managed AI: Claude, Llama, Mistral, Titan models via API, RAG with Knowledge Bases, Agents, fine-tuning, guardrails

knowledge_base.title: Amazon SageMaker — ML Platform
knowledge_base.description: End-to-end ML: build, train, deploy models, JumpStart (pre-trained), Studio notebooks, MLOps pipelines, inference endpoints

knowledge_base.title: Amazon SES — Email Service
knowledge_base.description: Scalable email: transactional + marketing, $0.10/1000 emails, DKIM/SPF, templates, analytics, high deliverability

knowledge_base.title: Amazon CloudFront — CDN & Edge
knowledge_base.description: Global CDN: 1TB free/month, edge functions (Lambda@Edge), HTTPS, DDoS protection, S3/ALB origin, 450+ POPs worldwide

knowledge_base.title: AWS Amplify — Full-Stack Web/Mobile
knowledge_base.description: Full-stack hosting: Git-based CI/CD, serverless backend, auth, storage, API, React/Next.js/Vue, free tier included

knowledge_base.title: Amazon Lightsail — Simple VPS
knowledge_base.description: Easy VPS for SMBs: predictable pricing from $3.50/mo, WordPress, Node.js, databases, load balancers, managed containers

knowledge_base.title: Amazon Cognito — User Authentication
knowledge_base.description: Managed auth: sign-up/sign-in, social login, MFA, 50K free MAUs, OAuth2/OIDC, user pools, identity federation

knowledge_base.title: AWS CodePipeline & CodeBuild — CI/CD
knowledge_base.description: Managed CI/CD: 1 free pipeline/month, 100 free build minutes, automated deploy to EC2/ECS/Lambda/S3

knowledge_base.title: AWS Documentation Hub
knowledge_base.description: Complete docs for all 200+ AWS services: getting started guides, API references, tutorials, architecture patterns

knowledge_base.title: AWS Skill Builder — Free Training
knowledge_base.description: 600+ free digital courses: Cloud Practitioner, Solutions Architect, Developer, ML, serverless, hands-on labs

knowledge_base.title: AWS Well-Architected Framework
knowledge_base.description: Best practices: 6 pillars (security, reliability, performance, cost, ops excellence, sustainability), review tool

knowledge_base.title: AWS Pricing Calculator
knowledge_base.description: Estimate costs before building: configure services, compare regions, export estimates, plan budgets

knowledge_base.title: Voicebox — Open-Source Voice Synthesis Studio
knowledge_base.description: 11k★ Open-source voice cloning powered by Qwen3-TTS: instant voice cloning from seconds of audio, multi-language, timeline editor, multi-track podcasts, macOS/Windows, MLX Apple Silicon acceleration
